00010 from GeneralForcefield import GeneralForcefield
00011 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00012 from MMTK.ForceFields import Amber99ForceField, Amber94ForceField
00013 
00014 class AmberForcefield(GeneralForcefield):
00015     '''Represents the Amber set of potential options from MMTK'''
00016     class Inventory(GeneralForcefield.Inventory):
00017         import pyre.inventory as inv
00018         electrostaticCutoff = inv.str('Electrostatic Cutoff (nm)', default = 'None (ewald summation for periodic systems)')
00019         electrostaticCutoff.meta['tip'] = 'cutoff for electrostatic interactions'
00020         type = inv.str('Type of Forcefield',default='Amber94')
00021         type.validator = inv.choice(['Amber94','Amber99'])
00022 
00023     def __init__(self, name='AmberForcefield'):
00024         Component.__init__(self, name, facility='facility')
00025         self.ii=self.inventory
00026 
00027     def getForcefield(self):
00028         '''returns the correct mmtk forcefield object'''
00029         #set default values
00030         ljCutoff=self.ii.ljCutoff
00031         electrostaticCutoff=self.ii.electrostaticCutoff
00032         if self.ii.ljCutoff=='None (minimum image convention for periodic systems)':
00033             ljCutoff=None
00034         if self.ii.electrostaticCutoff=='None (minimum image convention for periodic systems)':
00035             electrostaticCutoff=None
00036         if self.ii.type=='Amber94':
00037             return Amber94ForceField(ljCutoff, electrostaticCutoff)
00038         elif self.ii.type=='Amber99':
00039             return Amber99ForceField(ljCutoff, electrostaticCutoff)
00040         
00041 
00042         
00043     def _defaults(self):
00044         Component._defaults(self)
00045         return
00046 
00047     def _configure(self):
00048         Component._configure(self)
00049         return
00050 
00051     def _init(self):
00052         Component._init(self)
00053         return
